title: $MTR Season One Merch Proposal
body:
Greetings $MTR Token Holders,

	Miami Tech Runs Season One Merch is officially on the way! We are super excited to collaborate with New Jersey Sets (@newjerseysets) to give our DAO the flyest and highest quality merch around. Here’s a quick rundown:

- Season 1 will consist of all-over print $MTR shorts 
- 50 pairs of the shorts will be created, numbered, and sold as editions #1-50
- $MTR Golden Ticket and 3IRD EYE logo embroidered onto shorts 
- White drawstrings with gold aglets 
- Pricing would be $28-32 dollars per pair ($1400 - $1600 for total order)
- Delivered by December 9th *In time for Season 1 finale*

We plan on releasing a more extensive merch package for Season 2 including shorts, sweatsuits, and hats, but wanted to get some exclusive $MTR merch out before the end of Season 1!

New Jersey Sets is looking for us to lock our order in by the end of this week or early next week to ensure the shorts are delivered by December 9th. They also mentioned a partnership with us going forward and are extremely interested with what we’re doing here at Miami Tech Runs.

All in favor of purchasing the $MTR Genesis Shorts, click YES!!! 
*Check out more details and design mockups in token-gated chat room!*

















Design:

$MTR “Genesis” Shorts 



Art: Amir Barnett ($MTR Merch Lead)
Shorts Design: New Jersey Sets
author: 0x35a3c047453e4ab0d4FD28FD93616ab7Cc52206d
